Meaning: to act as, to pretend like
S1: 日本語が分からないふりをしました。
T1: I pretended not to understand Japanese.

S1: 彼女は自身の抱えている問題で落ち込んでいた。
T1: She was depressed by her own problems.

Meaning: to be divided, to break up, to separate
S1: 両親と別れて暮らしている。
T1: She lives separated from her parents.

Meaning: to be troubled, to be worried, to be bothered
S1: 海外旅行で困ったことはありますか。
T1: Have you ever had any problems when traveling abroad?

Meaning: to come out, to appear, to turn up, to emerge
S1: 彼は会議室から最後に出てきた。
T1: He was the last one out of the conference room.

S1: 私はテニスをする時、汗をかきます。
T1: I sweat when I play tennis.

S1: 天気が暑い時、汗が出ます。
T1: When the weather is hot, you sweat.

Meaning: to get up, to wake up, to occur, to happen, to arise
S1: 何か面白いこと起きないかなあ。
T1: I wonder if anything interesting will happen.

Meaning: to caution, to warn, be careful
S1: 水をこぼさないよう注意しなさい。
T1: Be careful not to spill the water.
